item.title: deepin安装使用Oh My Zsh
item.description: 安装Oh My Zsh github地址：https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 sudo apt install zsh sh -c "$(wget -O- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" # 将 Zsh
